div.p: PREMIUM MEMBERS WILL GET FIRST LOOK AT THE BOOK.
>>> THE FACTOR TIP OF THE DAY, YOUR SUMMER READING LIST
IN ADDITION TO MY BOOKS THERE ARE THREE NOVELS THAT MIGHT
ENTERTAIN YOU. FIRST HIDDEN ORDER BY BRAD THOR.
IT'S A THRILLER ABOUT THE FEDERAL GOVERNMENT.
LIGHT OF THE WORLD BY JAMES LEE BURKE.
BURKE ALWAYS WRITES ABOUT THE STRUGGLE BETWEEN GOOD AND EVIL.
THE NEXT, BAD MONKEY BY CARL HAASEN.
IT'S ONE TWISTED BOOK. IT MOVES ALONG.
DON'T GET MAD IF YOU BUY IT. THAT MONKEY IS REALLY BAD.
FACTOR TIP OF THE DAY. THAT IS IT FOR US.
